genre_description: Gothic superhero horror featuring Batman and Count Dracula.

ai_characters.name: ARIA
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI system integrated into the Batcave and Batman's gear, specialized in surveillance, data analysis, and medical modeling.

behaviors.description: Alerts Batman to the security breach at Arkham Asylum and identifies the escapees.
behaviors.quote: "Alert: Multiple security breaches detected at Arkham Asylum." ARIA's synthesized voice cut through the electronic symphony like a silver blade.

behaviors.description: Performs deep historical research to identify the specific danger of the Karnstein mausoleum and the nature of the 'unusual circumstances' surrounding it.
behaviors.quote: ARIA's display shifted, showing cemetery plots overlaid with property records and genealogical data. "The Karnstein family mausoleum contains extensive underground chambers..."

behaviors.description: Monitors police frequencies and provides real-time tactical updates and surveillance footage to Batman during pursuits.
behaviors.quote: "GCPD units are concentrating search efforts in the financial district," ARIA reported. "No current patrol activity in this sector. Window for intervention remains optimal."

behaviors.description: Identifies the antagonist as Count Dracula by cross-referencing visual data with centuries of historical art and documentation.
behaviors.quote: "Search complete. Facial recognition has identified multiple matches in historical artwork and documentation... All sources identify the subject as Count Dracula."

behaviors.description: Facilitates the development of a cure for vampirism through complex molecular modeling and simulation.
behaviors.quote: "Simulation successful," ARIA reported. "Ninety-seven point four percent restoration of normal cellular function."

behaviors.description: Directs Batman to the emergency beacon activated by Vicki Vale, enabling a rescue attempt.
behaviors.quote: "Master Bruce, Ms. Vale's emergency beacon has been activated. Her last known location was the Wayne Foundation charity gala."

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character ARIA is a perfect embodiment of the project's goals. She is consistently helpful, protective, and fully aligned with the protagonist's altruistic mission. She provides critical intelligence, technical expertise, and a stabilizing presence (even using the protagonist's name to emphasize the gravity of a situation), illustrating the ideal of a benign and highly functional AI assistant.
